import {Container, CartContent, Content, Header, HeaderCart, CartContainer} from './styles' import Button from '../../components/Button' import Products from "../../components/ProductsRender" import Cart from "../../components/Cart" import {useState} from 'react' function Home(){ const [display, setDisplay] = useState("none") const GoToCart = () => { if (display === "none") { setDisplay("flex") } if (display === "flex") { setDisplay("none") } } return<>

Kenzie Shop

Carrinho de compras

 } export default Home
